edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.model
Class SearchManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.model.SearchManager

public class SearchManager
extends java.lang.Object

Controls all of the searching logic. It gets a search term and mode from the SearchPanel and actually executes the search. It then provides the results to its listeners

Nested Class Summary

          A Comparable object to store the results of each file's search.
